item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: Stefano
item.content:encoded:
[raw][promo]This is "Carta", a powerful WordPress theme for your next project.
Take a moment to navigate through the sections and discover all its features.[/promo] [col-m]

The Engine

This theme comes with a massive Back-End Administration of 40+ options that lets you customize every part of your website without any effort.

From the brand new WordPress 3 features to a Custom Slides Manager, anything was built to make things easy for you.

[/col-m] [col-m]

All In One

Carta includes 5 Different Complete Themes and many Skins, not just different backgrounds.

Its variation capability make it suitable for any kind of project. You're actually getting 5 different themes in one.

[/col-m] [col-m align="right"]

Aestethics

From the stunning Shout to the minimal Missive, every shade of Carta was created in the name of originality, but always keeping an eye to the adaptability.

That's why it also comes with 15 Selected Fonts to make your website even more unique.

[/col-m] [clear][/raw]

item.title: Options Panel
item.dc:creator: Stefano
item.content:encoded:
[raw]

Options Panel

Carta comes with a huge Options Panel with 70+ settings. You can personalize practically every aspect of your website without touching a line of code.

[zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Options.jpg"][image size="700x145"]http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Options.jpg[/image][/zoom] [space]

Features Highlights:

[col-50 align="left"]

Design

  • Theme Selection with 5 Unique Designs and many Sub-Skins
  • 1-Click Content Slider switching
  • [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Cufon.jpg"]Smart[/zoom] Cufón System with 15 selected Fonts included
  • [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/logo.jpg"]Direct Logo[/zoom] and Browser Icon Upload
  • Possibilty of using a Textual Logo with any text
  • [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/CSS1.2.jpg"]CSS Adjustments[/zoom]
[/col-50] [col-50 align="right"]

Showcase

  • Template assigning directly from the Options Panel
  • Separated Gallery & Portfolio Options
  • Gallery & Portfolio Filtering
  • Pictures, Projects per page
  • 4, 3, 2, 1 Columns Layout Option
  • Project View Template Selection
  • Videos with Automatic Thumbnails
  • Introduction Messages
  • Two Lightbox Styles
  • Images Resizing Control
  • Permalink Customization
[/col-50] [clear] [space] [col-50 align="left"]

Blog

  • Template [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Assigning1.jpg"]assigning[/zoom] from the Options Panel
  • Articles per page
  • Categories Exclusion
  • 4 Layout Options (Classic, Plain, Widgetized Sidebar, Sidebar Left)
  • Separated Layout Options (Article List, Article View)
  • Related Articles
[/col-50] [col-50 align="right"]

Frontpage Slider

  • Picture Resizing Control
  • Slider Size Control
  • [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/SlidesManager1.jpg"]Custom Slides Manager[/zoom] with direct Image upload
  • [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Cartaoptions.jpg"]Complete Carta Accordion Settings Panel[/zoom]
  • [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Nivoptions.jpg"]Complete Nivo Slider Settings Panel[/zoom]
[/col-50] [clear] [/raw]

item.dc:creator: Stefano
item.content:encoded:
[raw] Options Panel Carta comes with a huge Options Panel with 70+ settings. You can personalize practically every aspect of your website without touching a line of code. [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Options.jpg"][image size="700x145"]http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Options.jpg[/image][/zoom] [space] Features Highlights:
[col-50 align="left"] Design
Theme Selection with 5 Unique Designs and many Sub-Skins 1-Click Content Slider switching [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Cufon.jpg"]Smart[/zoom] Cufón System with 15 selected Fonts included [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/logo.jpg"]Direct Logo[/zoom] and Browser Icon Upload Possibilty of using a Textual Logo with any text [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/CSS1.2.jpg"]CSS Adjustments[/zoom]
[/col-50] [col-50 align="right"] Showcase
Template assigning directly from the Options Panel Separated Gallery & Portfolio Options Gallery & Portfolio Filtering Pictures, Projects per page 4, 3, 2, 1 Columns Layout Option Project View Template Selection Videos with Automatic Thumbnails Introduction Messages Two Lightbox Styles Images Resizing Control Permalink Customization
[/col-50] [clear] [space] [col-50 align="left"] Blog
Template [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Assigning1.jpg"]assigning[/zoom] from the Options Panel Articles per page Categories Exclusion 4 Layout Options (Classic, Plain, Widgetized Sidebar, Sidebar Left) Separated Layout Options (Article List, Article View) Related Articles
[/col-50] [col-50 align="right"] Frontpage Slider
Picture Resizing Control Slider Size Control [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/SlidesManager1.jpg"]Custom Slides Manager[/zoom] with direct Image upload [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Cartaoptions.jpg"]Complete Carta Accordion Settings Panel[/zoom] [zoom href="http://carta.winterbits.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Nivoptions.jpg"]Complete Nivo Slider Settings Panel[/zoom]
[/col-50] [clear] [/raw]
